leadingComments.value: Component method for subscribing to push events.
Delegate method for sending out requests via the API client instance.
We wrap around the original `sendRequest()` method, in order to leave the promise unresolved when
the host component has been destroyed.

trailingComments.value: Register client instance for global use.

Initialize API client options.

*
             * WebSocket server configuration.

*
             * XHR server configuration.
User access token.
Open WebSocket connection (if applicable).
Define global mixin.
Keep track of all subscriptions.
Cleanup all existing component subscriptions.
Component method for subscribing to messages.
Component method for subscribing to push events.
Delegate method for sending out requests via the API client instance.
We wrap around the original `sendRequest()` method, in order to leave the promise unresolved when
the host component has been destroyed.
Register client instance for global use.
Register global 'onbeforeunload' event in order to turn off automatic reconnection feature and properly close
the WebSocket connection.
